text: int mini ( int * a , int n ) { int i , b = a [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] < b ) b = a [ i ] ; } return b ; } int main ( ) { int * a , j , n ; long int sum = 0 ; int i , t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; a = ( int * ) malloc ( sizeof ( int ) * n ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%ld" , a + j ) ; } sum = ( n - 1 ) * mini ( a , n ) ; printf ( "%ld\n" , sum ) ; free ( a ) ; } return 0 ; }
